title: SCAN_RESOURCE_ROOT
content:
0x636F097F// ScanResourceRoot
void SCAN_RESOURCE_ROOT(char* rootPath, func callback);Parameters:rootPath: The resource directory to scan.callback: A callback that will receive an object with results.Scans the resources in the specified resource root. This function is only available in the 'monitor mode' process and is
not available for user resources.
codeBlocks:
// ScanResourceRoot
void SCAN_RESOURCE_ROOT(char* rootPath, func callback);
